external_games.name: Idle Champions - Undead Knight Solaak Skin & Feat Pack

name: Idle Champions: Undead Knight Solaak Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Solaak (if you don't already own them) Undead Knight Solaak Skin An Epic Feat for Solaak 7 Gold Solaak Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
